title: (x) White Cube Gallery London sans - Neuzeit S {Angel}
content:
Hello everybody,  
does anybody know the type used for the White Cube Gallery Logo.  
 [www.whitecube.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131309/http:/www.whitecube.com/ "www.whitecube.com")  
Kind Regards

 [‹ Looking for a baseball style script font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131309/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38202 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Woodtype-like sans in several widths on poster - H&FJ Knockout {Rainer, Sebastian} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131309/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38227 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ricolar

comments.content: Very hard to tell at such a small size - Helvetica?

They have a map on their site in PDF format that lists it as NeuzeitWhitecubeLogotype. So some version of Neuzeit I suppose.

[http://www.whitecube.com/info/map/masonsyard/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131309/http:/www.whitecube.com/info/map/masonsyard/ "http://www.whitecube.com/info/map/masonsyard/")

Thanks Guys!!! Yes it´s Neuzeit S  
!!!

Neuzeit? D’oh!  
The PDF ace in the hole – great searching tactics, Angel! :)
